price: Ó sì tọ́ka sí ọmọ náà. Wọ́n sọ pé: “Báwo ni a ó ṣe bá ẹni tó wà lórí ìtẹ́, tó jẹ́ ọmọ òpóǹló sọ̀rọ̀?”
arabic: فَأَشَارَتۡ إِلَيۡهِۖ قَالُواْ كَيۡفَ نُكَلِّمُ مَن كَانَ فِي ٱلۡمَهۡدِ صَبِيّٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-ashārat ilayhi qālū kayfa nukallimu man kāna fī al-mahdi ṣabiyyan
